Class MainGameViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ClientViewGUI.MainGameViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractController, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MainGameViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, AbstractController
    This Class is the GUI for the actual match displaying all the graphical elements
